- attack - unhealthy behavior
- force - unhealthy behavior
- humiliate - unhealthy behavior
- hit - unhealthy behavior
- torture - unhealthy behavior
- infringe - unhealthy behavior
- support - healthy behavior
- collaborate - healthy behavior
- cooperate - healthy behavior
- empathize - healthy behavior
- respect - healthy behavior
- tolerate - healthy behavior
- call you names - unhealthy behavior
- give you angry looks - unhealthy behavior
- put down your friends - unhealthy behavior
- say things to scare you - unhealthy behavior
- make you do something embarrassing - unhealthy behavior
- encourage you to open up - healthy behavior
- open to your ideas - healthy behavior
- excited to see you - healthy behavior
- listen attentively to you - healthy behavior
- make an effort with your family - healthy behavior

Hey, love? Is everything okay? I want to make sure you're doing well and that we're on the same page when it comes to what's healthy and what's not in our relationship.
